ee anuwa mayi masa 31 wana dina pe.wa. 9.00 sita pa.wa. 1.00 dakwa rajakariwalin baharawime wruththiya ka‡∑äriyamargaya diwayina purama ka‡∑äriyathmaka wana bawada dainika nadaththu katayuthu, bindawatim aluthwadiya kirim, paribhogika sewa katayuthu, manu satahan ganim, bilpath ayakirim bilpath nikuth kirim aadi katayuthu kisiwak sidu nowana bawada upali rathnayaka sahodaraya sandahan karayi. 31 dina piligatha haki wisandumak nolabunahoth 31 wana dina mema wruththiya ka‡∑äriyamargaya diwayina purama ka‡∑äriyathmaka wana athara 31 wana dina sita siyalu athikala sewa saha sathi antha sewawalin siyalu sewakayin iwath wiya yuthu bawata thiranaya kara thibena bawath injineru saha injineru nowana widhayaka shrenin mayi 30 sita aarambha karana lada akurata wada wyaparaya wisandumak labena thek digatama ka‡∑äriyathmaka wana bawada pawasana rathnayaka sahodaraya mehi pa‡∑äradhana illim wanuye porondu wu aakarayata 25% ka watup wadiwim, kappadu nokara laba dena lesath wishamathawayak iwath karana lesa bawada pawasiya.
